## PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp.liquidateUpTo() method

Liquidate the least collateralized Vaults up to a maximum number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfVaultsToLiquidate: number, overrides?: BitcoinsTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<LiquidationDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maximumNumberOfVaultsToLiquidate | number | Stop after liquidating this many Vaults. |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedBitcoinsMoneypTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedbitcoinsmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[LiquidationDetails](./lib-base.liquidationdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
